title: On the new I-140 highway, that connects 74/76 to highway 17 south, there is a high fence that has been constructed on both sides of the highway, and runs the length of the interstate. Why has this fence been constructed?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2015/06/why-do-fences-run-down-both-sides-of-the-new-section-of-i-140/
